text: The Hindustan Aeronautics Limited is an aerospace company of India. Its headquarters are in Bangalore. It is one of Asia's major aerospace companies. It is managed by the Ministry of Defence of the Indian Government. It builds and modifies military and civil aircraft. In addition, it is also involved in maintaining airports. Category:Aircraft companies Category:Manufacturing companies of India Category:Military of India Category:Bangalore
title: Hindustan Aeronautics Limited
